```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(electionsBR)
```


```{r}
df <- elections_tse(year = 2020, type = "personal_finances", uf = "all")
df |> 
  mutate(VR_BEM_CANDIDATO = str_replace(VR_BEM_CANDIDATO, ",", ".")) |> 
  group_by(ANO_ELEICAO, SQ_CANDIDATO) |> 
  summarise(sum(as.numeric(VR_BEM_CANDIDATO)))


df
```
